titles.title: A bill to codify certain public land orders relating to the revocation of certain withdrawals of public land in the State of Alaska.
A bill to codify certain public land orders relating to the revocation of certain withdrawals of public land in the State of Alaska.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 118-311.

bill.summary: This bill enacts into law the provisions of certain public land orders relating to the revocation of the withdrawal of certain public lands in Alaska.
